title: Mountain Ocean Lip Trip - 0.165 oz, (Case of 12)
features: Protects from sun, wind and extreme conditions
description: Mountain Ocean Lip Trip was developed and tested by sport and outdoor enthusiasts from the high-altitude Rocky Mountain environment to the tropical exposure of the Caribbean and South Pacific.Last Three Times Longer - 100% beeswax base (no petroleum products) locks in moisture base. Leaves lips smooth and soft. Maximum Protection - Protects lips, nose and face from sun, wind and extreme conditions. Mountain Ocean Lip Trip was developed and tested by sport and outdoor enthusiasts from the high-altitude Rocky Mountain environment to the tropical exposure of the Caribbean and South Pacific. Beeswax varies in consistency depending on temperature. Free Of Contains No: PABA or Mineral Oil. Disclaimer These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
